case_name_full: The People of the State of New York v. Harry D. Markellos

opinions.opinion_text: Judgment of the County Court of Queens .County, convicting defendant of the crimes of burglary in the first degree, robbery in the first degree, grand larceny in the first degree, and assault in the second degree, and sentencing him to imprisonment in Sing Sing State Prison for indeterminate concurrent terms of not less than ten years nor more than twenty years, unanimously affirmed. No opinion. Present — Hagarty, Acting P. J., Carswell, Johnston, Adel and Sneed, JJ.

court_short_name: Appellate Division of the Supreme Court of New York
court_full_name: Appellate Division of the Supreme Court of the State of New York
